SEARCH
Package model

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
model.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
Represents a loan in the library system, containing information about the user, book, loan date, due date, and return status.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(int id, User user, Book book, Date loanDate, Date dueDate, int returned)
      Constructs a Loan object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the loan.
      user - User who borrowed the book.
      book - Book that was borrowed.
      loanDate - Date when the book was borrowed.
      dueDate - Expected return date.
      returned - Return status: 0 for not returned, 1 for returned.
